action.action-desc: Mr. Sessions introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Financial Services

form.official-title: To amend the Securities Act of 1933, the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, the Investment Company Act of 1940, and the Investment Advisors Act of 1940 with respect to the determination of violations.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Securities Enforcement Clarity Act of 2025 or the SEC Act of 2025.

section.header: Determination of the number of violations

subsection.text: The Securities Act of 1933 is amended—

paragraph.text: in section 8A(g) (15 U.S.C. 77h–1(g)), by adding at the end the following:
For purposes of determining the number of violations for which to impose penalties under paragraph (1), separate acts of noncompliance are a single violation when the acts are the result of—

subparagraph.text: a common or a substantially overlapping originating cause;
the same misstatement or omission; or
a continuing failure to comply.
